channel.title: Jar and Signing Webclient help
channel.description:
My client.jar doesn't open when I double click it and when I try to open the client.bat it says: C:\Users\Hizzy-HP\Desktop>java -jar client.jar 'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue. . .
And my operating system is 64-bit, in which I use jdk1.7.0_11. I need help with this

item.title: Jar and Signing Webclient help
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

[quote=“C2dahizzy, post:1, topic:478489”]My client.jar doesn’t open when I double click it and when I try to open the client.bat it says:
C:\Users\Hizzy-HP\Desktop>java -jar client.jar
‘java’ is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file.
Press any key to continue. . .

And my operating system is 64-bit, in which I use jdk1.7.0_11. I need help with this[/quote]
Set your classpaths. Youtube works fine for tuts on it. “Setting java class paths”

Read full topic
